title: Filthy F*ckers: MC Romance Complete 7-Book Series
features: With over 10,000 reviews and a 4.4 star average, this series is not to be missed. This 7-book boxed set includes the 6-book (complete) Filthy F*cker MC Romance Series of full-length stand-alone MC Romance novels, each of which follows the life of one member of the Filthy F*ckers Motorcycle Club. Based in Oceanside, California, the Filthy F*ckers are an outlaw motorcycle club that seeks vengeance on those they feel escape the hand of the law. Each member of the club depicted (our bike-riding heroes) are loyal, protective, and sexy as hell. In the beginning, none are in an active relationship. For this club, the MC is the only relationship they need. When each respective love interest comes along, everything clanges. As a whole, this set includes no cheating, no sex outside the relationship, and each has its respective HEA. Additionally, the series has an HEA, wrapping everything up with a nice little bow in the end of book 6. This series includes all 6 books of the Filthy Fuckers MC Romance series, and the spin-off book, His Rules, as a bonus.
description: Review
HARD is hard to stop reading
....from the moment you begin your sucked straight into the world of this MC and it's incredible cast - Moments in West Florida
I had a hard time setting the book down
once I started to read it. -Paige Turner
From the cover to the dedication to the very last page
, which is amazing by the way, Hard pulled me into Payton's world an then into Nick's and
kept me glued and losing sleep
because I just could not put it down. - One Click Book Addict>
Best read of the summer of 2016
- Bookerz Babes Book Blogg
I loved every bit of Hard
and can't wait to read more in this series.- She Hearts BooksAs the first book in the Filthy F*ckers MC, it captivated me from the first page, and
I didn't want it to end!
- Liz, CraziesRus Book Blog The story of Hard was unlike any story I've read before.
It was more than a romance story
, it was more than a story with erotic elements, it was just 100% different. - Literary Treasure Chest Scott Hildreth is a master of playing with emotions and this entire book gave me feels.
Right from the start, Scott starts with a bang and doesn't let up until the end
. - Rene Entress's BlogHoly Friggin' Filthy F*$kers!!!!!
Wow, just wow
. - Crazy Daisy Book WhoreI have to start off by saying
I usually don't read MC books
, it's really not my favorite genre,
but I am so glad I read this one!
- The Book Sirens
